resources.string:
Steps to use this app:
 1. Pair your band with the phone
 2. Make sure Microsoft Health is installed
 3. Press the Start button
 4. If the band is full, go to Microsoft Health to remove one tile, then repeat step 3
 5. If it has not already been added, a new tile with barcode layouts should be placed on your band
 6. Page data should be sent to the tile
 7. Press the Stop button to end the demo and remove the tile.
